text: Bandhi railway station (, ) is located in Bandhi town, Shaheed Benazir Abad district, Sindh province, Pakistan. Current Station Master of Bandhi Railway Station is Muhammad Mirza Abro. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== Category:Railway stations in Shaheed Benazir Abad District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Bandhi railway station
